Ransford's Notes

CPD submission preparation checklist

This page tracks evidence preparation for a potential CPD submission. It does not imply accreditation, endorsement, or approval.

CPD learning platform

This learning platform is designed to support independent CPD submissions. Formal accreditation is applied for separately.

Evidence prepared

The following evidence is prepared and can be shared with assessors as part of a submission:

  • Course syllabi with learning objectives
  • Assessment methods documentation
  • Evidence capture mechanisms
  • CPD hour calculation logic
  • Quality assurance processes
  • Audit log system
  • Version control documentation

Download CPD evidence pack

Manual steps

The following steps require manual action:

  • Completed application forms per accreditor
  • Payment of application fees
  • Review and approval process
  • Ongoing compliance reporting

Submission status

CPD Certification Service

Submission preparation in progress. No approval is claimed.

Preparing

Course Coverage

Current courses mapped to accreditor requirements:

  • cybersecurity: 56 CPD hours, applicable to 3 accreditor body/bodies
  • ai: 10 CPD hours, applicable to 3 accreditor body/bodies
  • software-architecture: 12 CPD hours, applicable to 4 accreditor body/bodies
  • data: 8 CPD hours, applicable to 2 accreditor body/bodies
  • digitalisation: 6 CPD hours, applicable to 2 accreditor body/bodies

Browser-native courses, tools, labs, and games built to stay readable, calm, and offline-capable. Clear inputs, clear outputs, and no hidden mechanics.

CPD: structured objectives with conservative hour estimates and evidence-friendly outputs.
